content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position x)

### Coal extraction point at position(y)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position y1)

### Iron plate production
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position x) for smelting iron ore into iron plates
- Assembling machine (position z) for crafting iron gear wheels and iron sticks

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting due to insufficient resources
- Ensure you have enough required items in your inventory before attempting to craft. For example, crafting iron gear wheels requires iron plates.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors when crafting without a crafting machine or furnace
- Verify that you are using the correct crafting machine or furnace for the item you are trying to craft.
